code: export var BASE_URL='https://auth.nomoreparties.co';export function handleRegister(password,email){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signup"),{headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify({password:password,email:email})}).then(function(res){return res.ok&&res.json();});}export function handleLogin(password,email){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signin"),{headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify({password:password,email:email})}).then(function(res){return res.ok&&res.json();});}export function handleCheckAuth(){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/users/me"),{headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json',Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem('token'))},method:'GET'}).then(function(res){return res.ok?res.json():Promise.reject(res.statusText);});}
